text: Some songs you get. Some songs you may not. And I think that's the beauty of art: to question and to ask, to understand the deeper meaning after two or three or four listenings.
author: Janelle Monae

text: I know that I've got big ears and a big forehead and that my hair sticks up. But I'm happy with myself. I'm not necessarily trying to win a beauty pageant here.
author: Clay Aiken

text: My theory of characterization is basically this: Put some dirt on a hero, and put some sunshine on the villain, one brush stroke of beauty on the villain.
author: Justin Cronin

text: I think the beauty looks I most regret are those I was persuaded into.
author: Dita Von Teese

text: Physical beauty isn't so impressive to me.
author: Dita Von Teese
